noisepp::ScaleBiasModule

noisepp::ScaleBiasModule Class Reference

#include <NoiseScaleBias.h>

Inheritance diagram for noisepp::ScaleBiasModule:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Transforms the output value of the source module by scaling with bias.
